title: Boards Profile Icon HUGE
body:
Whenever I look at my or other people's Boards profiles, their icons become exaggeratedly enlarged, [as seen here](http://i.imgur.com/gfzv6aC.png).

Is this a common bug, or is it just me..?

replies.body: It should be fixed now, friend. :)
So it doesn't happen to you at all?
I just checked mine and it's huge too. Very odd.
See??? How is nobody noticing this??
Well I for one rarely ever look at profiles on here, so that could be a reason.
I look at mine all the time (I have a very long-lasting bug that prevents me from seeing updates, so I have to manually look through all my comments...).
Most likely a FEK bug. Tundra Fizz should have acknowledged this by now.
Actually, I just checked without FEK on and it appears to be a Riot board issue.
It's been like this for probably weeks now..
Just let's me see your cute icon better dear :3

haha you're funny

######~~i really want to kms~~
I gotta admit, chubby birds do look cuter enlarged...

Plus it has a big heart on it, and... those blushy pink, happy-bird cheeks..

Aaaaaa I love birds.
